languages.text: "И раз уж мне никогда больше не быть бойцом... забери это. Тебе пригодится в походе хорошее оружие, а у меня оно будет в комнате с трофеями пылиться".
"And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."
languages.original_text: "И раз уж мне никогда больше не быть бойцом... забери это. Тебе пригодится в походе хорошее оружие, а у меня оно будет в комнате с трофеями пылиться".

traits.locale_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."
"And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."
"And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."
"And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

languages.text: «Y dado que no volveré a entrar en combate... tome esto. Le vendría bien contar con una buena arma, y esta merece algo mejor que coger polvo en mi sala de trofeos».
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

traits.locale_text: «Y dado que no volveré a entrar en combate... tome esto. Le vendría bien contar con una buena arma, y esta merece algo mejor que coger polvo en mi sala de trofeos».

languages.text: “既然我再也上不了战场了……那这个就给你吧。你配得上这把经久耐用的精良武器，而这么好的武器也不该在我的收藏室里落灰。”
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

traits.locale_text: “既然我再也上不了战场了……那这个就给你吧。你配得上这把经久耐用的精良武器，而这么好的武器也不该在我的收藏室里落灰。”

languages.text: « Et puisque je ne remettrai plus jamais les pieds sur un champ de bataille... prenez ça. Vous auriez bien besoin d'une arme robuste et celle-ci mérite mieux que de prendre la poussière dans ma salle des trophées. »
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

traits.locale_text: « Et puisque je ne remettrai plus jamais les pieds sur un champ de bataille... prenez ça. Vous auriez bien besoin d'une arme robuste et celle-ci mérite mieux que de prendre la poussière dans ma salle des trophées. »

languages.text: 「俺はもう二度と戦うことはないだろう…これを使え。頑丈な武器が必要だろう。この武器は、俺の戦利品室で埃をかぶっているより価値があるだろうさ」
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はもう二度と戦うことはないだろう…これを使え。頑丈な武器が必要だろう。この武器は、俺の戦利品室で埃をかぶっているより価値があるだろうさ」

languages.text: "Und da ich nie wieder einen Kampf erleben werde ... nehmt das. Ihr könntet eine robuste Waffe brauchen, und diese hat etwas Besseres verdient, als in meinem Trophäenraum Staub anzusammeln."
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."

traits.locale_text: "Und da ich nie wieder einen Kampf erleben werde ... nimmt das. Ihr könntet eine robuste Waffe brauchen, und diese hat etwas Besseres verdient, als in meinem Trophäenraum Staub anzusammeln."

languages.text: "Artık savaşla, dövüşle işim olmayacağından... Şunu sana vermek isterim. Sağlam bir silah işine yarayacaktır. Ganimet odamda toz toplamayı hak etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "And since I shall never see combat again... take this. You could use a sturdy weapon, and this one deserves better than gathering dust in my trophy room."
